title: WTB Portraits:  Red Chance, J. Collins, E. Collins, Dahlen (Brooklyn)
author: taul166

posts.post_title: WTB Portraits:  Red Chance, J. Collins, E. Collins, Dahlen (Brooklyn)
posts.post_content:
Hi All -

Prefer PSA graded (2, 3, or 4).  My almost complete T206 Portrait subset is all PSA graded, but will consider SGC graded.

We have and SGC 3, and SGC 2, and a raw Chance Red portrait.  And we have a J Collins SGC 2 (Polar Bear) and a J Collins SGC 1 Tolstoi.  All are currently below comps and up for sale in our T206 Set Break Auction at [url]www.T206Cards.com[/url]
